item.description:
Hi Ladies,

As suggested by a few members of the group, I decided to schedule a Meet Up at the new Steak and Hibachi Grill at Mansfield Crossing. This place is getting rave reviews!!

This restaurant offers Japanese cuisine and an assortment of Shushi combinations. They cook your custom ordered dishes right in front of you at their Hibachi grills.

I will need an EXACT count of who plans to attend- even if that means changing your rsvp the same day of the event. I am planning a reservation at one of the Grill tables (where all the action takes place) and I need exact numbers. If you rsvp that you plan to attend and do not show (without changing your rsvp), I am afraid that I will have to remove you from the group. I hate to do this but there have been far too many events where people do not update if they cannot show and I wind up scrambling to get things in order while at the venue.

I hope that many new faces can show as this restaurant seems like a great place to hold a Meet Up!

As the date nears I will send out exact plans on where to meet/time etc etc.

Thanks and Happy Holidays Ladies!!!

Lisa
item.name: Sake Steak House! (and Hibachi!)
